text:
@simmonssteve The Maple Leafs are a hott mess.

19,408 days since a Cup. 

118 days since losing to an AHL Zamboni driver.

0 days since having a player test positive for COVID-19. Yea, ‘cause Auston Matthews has COVID19. Sheesh!
